#include<cstdio>

using namespace std;

typedef unsigned long long _int64;

_int64 DATA[65]={1ull,1ull,2ull,3ull,6ull,10ull,20ull,35ull,70ull,126ull,252ull,462ull,924ull,1716ull,3432ull,6435ull,12870ull,24310ull,48620ull,92378ull,184756ull,352716ull,705432ull,1352078ull,2704156ull,5200300ull,10400600ull,20058300ull,40116600ull,77558760ull,155117520ull,300540195ull,601080390ull,1166803110ull,2333606220ull,4537567650ull,9075135300ull,17672631900ull,35345263800ull,68923264410ull,137846528820ull,269128937220ull,538257874440ull,1052049481860ull,2104098963720ull,4116715363800ull,8233430727600ull,16123801841550ull,32247603683100ull,63205303218876ull,126410606437752ull,247959266474052ull,495918532948104ull,973469712824056ull,1946939425648112ull,3824345300380220ull,7648690600760440ull,15033633249770520ull,30067266499541040ull,59132290782430712ull,118264581564861424ull,232714176627630544ull,465428353255261088ull,916312070471295267ull,1832624140942590534ull};

int main()
{
	int T;
	scanf("%d",&T);
	while(T--)
	{
		_int64 N;
		scanf("%llu",&N);
		for( int ans=2;ans<65;++ans)
			if(DATA[ans]>=N)
			{
				printf("%d\n",ans);
				break;
			}
	}
	
	return 0;
}
